mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.carrier_code AS "carrierCode", a.route_code AS "routeCode", a.route_name AS "routeName", a.start_area_id AS "startAreaId", a.end_area_id AS "endAreaId", a.mileage AS "mileage", a.timeliness AS "timeliness", a.org_id AS "orgId"
bcc.ebcu_name_cn AS "carrierName", sas.name AS "startAreaName", sae.name AS "endAreaName", so.name AS "orgName"

LEFT JOIN bms_customer bcc ON a.carrier_code = bcc.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = bcc.org_id LEFT JOIN sys_area sas ON a.start_area_id = sas.id LEFT JOIN sys_area sae ON a.end_area_id = sae.id LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON a.org_id = so.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bms_carrier_route ( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, rec_ver, carrier_code, route_code, route_name, start_area_id, end_area_id, mileage, timeliness, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{recVer}, #{carrierCode}, #{routeCode}, #{routeName}, #{startAreaId}, #{endAreaId}, #{mileage}, #{timeliness}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bms_carrier_route SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1, carrier_code = #{carrierCode}, route_code = #{routeCode}, route_name = #{routeName}, start_area_id = #{startAreaId}, end_area_id = #{endAreaId}, mileage = #{mileage}, timeliness = #{timeliness}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bms_carrier_route WHERE carrier_code = #{carrierCode} AND route_code = #{routeCode} AND org_id = #{orgId}
